entry.title: Tuesday night: A few rain showers or wet flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and wet flurries ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 18 April 2023
